methods.name: QueryFiles
methods.description: Performs a search query for published files

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: enumeration EPublishedFileQueryType in clientenums.h

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor to paginate through the results (set to '*' for the first request).  Prefer this over using the page parameter, as it will allow you to do deep pagination.  When used, the page parameter will be ignored.

parameters.name: numperpage
parameters.description: (Optional) The number of results, per page to return.

parameters.name: creator_appid
parameters.description: App that created the files

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App that consumes the files

parameters.name: requiredtags
parameters.description: Tags to match on. See match_all_tags parameter below

parameters.name: excludedtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must NOT be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: match_all_tags
parameters.description: If true, then items must have all the tags specified, otherwise they must have at least one of the tags.

parameters.name: required_flags
parameters.description: Required flags that must be set on any returned items

parameters.name: omitted_flags
parameters.description: Flags that must not be set on any returned items

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Text to match in the item's title or description

parameters.name: filetype
parameters.description: EPublishedFileInfoMatchingFileType

parameters.name: child_publishedfileid
parameters.description: Find all items that reference the given item.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then this is the number of days to get votes for [1,7].

parameters.name: include_recent_votes_only
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then limit result set just to items that have votes within the day range given

parameters.name: cache_max_age_seconds
parameters.description: Allow stale data to be returned for the specified number of seconds.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search in and also what gets returned. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: required_kv_tags
parameters.description: Required key-value tags to match on.

parameters.name: taggroups
parameters.description: (Optional) At least one of the tags must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: date_range_created
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter to items created within this range.

parameters.name: date_range_updated
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter to items updated within this range.

parameters.name: excluded_content_descriptors
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter out items that have these content descriptors.

parameters.name: totalonly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the total number of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: ids_only
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the published file ids of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: return_vote_data
parameters.description: Return vote data

parameters.name: return_tags
parameters.description: Return tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_kv_tags
parameters.description: Return key-value tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_previews
parameters.description: Return preview image and video details in the file details

parameters.name: return_children
parameters.description: Return child item ids in the file details

parameters.name: return_short_description
parameters.description: Populate the short_description field instead of file_description

parameters.name: return_for_sale_data
parameters.description: Return pricing information, if applicable

parameters.name: return_metadata
parameters.description: Populate the metadata

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: return_details
parameters.description: By default, if none of the other 'return_*' fields are set, only some voting details are returned. Set this to true to return the default set of details.

parameters.name: strip_description_bbcode
parameters.description: Strips BBCode from descriptions.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

parameters.name: return_reactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

methods.name: GetSubSectionData
methods.description: Get sub section data (for table of contents, a specific section, or all)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

methods.name: GetDetails
methods.description: Retrieves information about a set of published files.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: publishedfileids
parameters.description: Set of published file Ids to retrieve details for.

parameters.name: includetags
parameters.description: If true, return tag information in the returned details.

parameters.name: includeadditionalpreviews
parameters.description: If true, return preview information in the returned details.

parameters.name: includechildren
parameters.description: If true, return children in the returned details.

parameters.name: includekvtags
parameters.description: If true, return key value tags in the returned details.

parameters.name: includevotes
parameters.description: If true, return vote data in the returned details.

parameters.name: short_description
parameters.description: If true, return a short description instead of the full description.

parameters.name: includeforsaledata
parameters.description: If true, return pricing data, if applicable.

parameters.name: includemetadata
parameters.description: If true, populate the metadata field.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specifies the localized text to return. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: strip_description_bbcode
parameters.description: Strips BBCode from descriptions.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

parameters.name: includereactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

methods.name: GetUserFiles
methods.description: Retrieves files published by a user.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Steam ID of the user whose files are being requested.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App Id of the app that the files were published to.

parameters.name: shortcutid
parameters.description: (Optional) Shortcut Id to retrieve published files from.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: (Optional) Starting page for results.

parameters.name: numperpage
parameters.description: (Optional) The number of results, per page to return.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of files to be returned.

parameters.name: sortmethod
parameters.description: (Optional) Sorting method to use on returned values.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: (optional) Filter by privacy settings.

parameters.name: requiredtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: excludedtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must NOT be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: required_kv_tags
parameters.description: Required key-value tags to match on.

parameters.name: filetype
parameters.description: (Optional) File type to match files to.

parameters.name: creator_appid
parameters.description: App Id of the app that published the files, only matched if specified.

parameters.name: match_cloud_filename
parameters.description: Match this cloud filename if specified.

parameters.name: cache_max_age_seconds
parameters.description: Allow stale data to be returned for the specified number of seconds.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specifies the localized text to return. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: taggroups
parameters.description: (Optional) At least one of the tags must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: excluded_content_descriptors
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter out items that have these content descriptors.

parameters.name: totalonly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the total number of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: ids_only
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the published file ids of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: return_vote_data
parameters.description: Return vote data

parameters.name: return_tags
parameters.description: Return tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_kv_tags
parameters.description: Return key-value tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_previews
parameters.description: Return preview image and video details in the file details

parameters.name: return_children
parameters.description: Return child item ids in the file details

parameters.name: return_short_description
parameters.description: Populate the short_description field instead of file_description

parameters.name: return_for_sale_data
parameters.description: Return pricing information, if applicable

parameters.name: return_metadata
parameters.description: Populate the metadata field

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: strip_description_bbcode
parameters.description: Strips BBCode from descriptions.

parameters.name: return_reactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

parameters.name: startindex_override
parameters.description: Backwards compatible for the client.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

parameters.name: return_apps
parameters.description: Return list of apps the items belong to

methods.name: GetUserFileCount
methods.description: Retrieves a count of files published by a user. Uses the same messages as GetUserFiles but totalonly must be true.
